question.title: getting Cannot invoke "org.w3c.dom.Node.getLocalName()" because "node" is null in Android studio
question.body:
I'm working on an Android project and encountering a strange error during the build process. The app fails while executing the :app:mergeDebugResources task with the following error: I have tried with multiple options like clean build and rebuild. Invalidate caches...

> Error: Cannot invoke "org.w3c.dom.Node.getLocalName()" because "node" is null
* Exception is:
org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskExecutionException: Execution failed for task ':app:mergeDebugResources'.
    at org.gradle.api.
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot invoke "org.w3c.dom.Node.getLocalName()" because "node" is null   ... 131 more```
